components.title: Mit PayPal zahlen
components.text: Pay for your order online using the PayPal service on the website.

components.title: Mit Carte zahlen
components.text: Our courier has terminal and accepts card for payment.

components.title: Mit Bargeld zahlen
components.text: Pay cash when you pick up your order. Please remember to let us know in advance if you need the change.
